Params: {3: 'As you walk up to Wanshi, wind rushes through the passage behind, carrying what seems to be the metallic scent of blood.'}
{2: '...You were right, Wanshi. Greg and Sandy are probably in trouble.', 3: '5'}
{3: 'Acting on instinct, you carefully dodge aside and raise your gun at the darkness behind you.'}
{3: "Only static crackles through the comms. Wanshi doesn't respond."}
{3: "Sensing something amiss, you grip your gun and quickly back up two steps to Wanshi's last known location, carefully peering into the room."}
{1: '1', 3: 'The scene unfolds before your eyes—something seems off about Wanshi, when a Corrupted suddenly springs from the pitch-black void behind him and drags him into the depths.'}
{3: "Pure reflex takes over—you lunge forward and manage to grab Wanshi by the wrist just before he's dragged down."}
{3: 'But the consequences of acting on instinct are all too clear.'}
{3: 'Both you and Wanshi are yanked down into the void, from which a cacophony of crashing sounds comes.'}
{3: 'Despite your spinning vision, you stagger to your feet and fire several shots at the blurry shadows ahead.'}
{3: 'The Corrupted fails to dodge. As the bullet finds its mark, the Corrupted releases its grip on Wanshi and rapidly retreats down the long corridor ahead.'}
{3: 'When you look in the direction where the Corrupted disappeared, you see nothing but the marks carved into the ground by its exposed framework.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As you slowly regain your vision, Wanshi comes into view—with his brows furrowed and revolver clutched tighter, he appears distant and dazed.'}
{2: 'I suspected there were M.I.N.D. fluctuations in you when we were up there.', 3: '51'}
{2: 'Is it because of the new frame?', 3: '52'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'But I should be fully adapted to this by now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Establish a M.I.N.D. connection with me now.', 3: '54'}
{1: '1', 3: "Unlike the calm of the previous connection, you feel turbulent waves as soon as Wanshi's Mind Beacon enters your M.I.N.D."}
{2: 'Babylonia would never allow you to descend in this condition.', 3: '67'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'There were only minor M.I.N.D. fluctuations before, and even Asimov gave it the all-clear... This is the first time something like this has happened.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'This probably has to do with the Corrupted just now... Ugh!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Wanshi's memory data spirals out of control, throwing your M.I.N.D. into complete chaos."}
{2: 'There seems to be... something else in your M.I.N.D.?'}
